Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.GameState

  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    GameState.java - a class that handles all the game mechanics

                                                boolean flag)
        Get a random possible movement
        Parameters:
        x - actual x coordinate
        y - actual y coordinate
        flag - true if it is possible to go to the edges, false otherwise (e.g: must be false for an ogre)
        Returns:
        random movement
